name: little-cleaner
description: A small utility for reducing the chance of XSS and HTML injection

scripts.prepare: cp ./src/*.js ./browser/ && cp ./src/little-cleaner.js index.js && uglifyjs browser/little-cleaner.js -o browser/little-cleaner.min.js

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
